text: Sierre is a district of the canton of Valais in Switzerland. It contains the following municipalities: * Ayer * Chalais * Chandolin * Chermignon * Chippis * Grimentz * Grône * Icogne * Lens * Miège * Mollens * Montana-Vermala * Randogne * Sierre * Saint-Jean * Saint-Léonard * Saint-Luc * Venthône * Veyras * Vissoie
title: Sierre District
